data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Zhuhai, Guangdong, China need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Zhuhai, Guangdong, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Zhuhai hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Zhuhai. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Zhuhai, Guangdong, China to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Zhuang, Liujiang people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, convict the 153,239 believers in Zhuhai to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Zhuhai, Guangdong, China to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Zhuhai, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
